mapper.sql: menu_id, module_id, menu_name, menu_code, url, level, description, status, order_by
mapper.insert:
insert into t_menu
menu_id,
module_id,
menu_name,
menu_code,
url,
level,
description,
status,
order_by,

mapper.update:
update t_menu
module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_menu set module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_menu t
and t.menu_name like CONCAT('%', #{menuName},'%')
ORDER BY t.menu_id
